title: Hextech Chest Icon
body: I unlocked a SG Pix icon through hextech crafting, but it said "Little Devil Teemo Icon Unlocked!" and "Little Devil Teemo Icon has permanently been added..." This isn't going to effect my eligibility for the normal Little Devil Teemo icon, is it?

replies.body:
I checked your account and it looks like this was just a notification that we were giving you the Teemo Icon you earned for participating in the Teemoing 2016.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=iez1FcgV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-09T03:27:57.847+0000)
>
> I checked your account and it looks like this was just a notification that we were giving you the Teemo Icon you earned for participating in the Teemoing 2016.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

Hey Targons Blade,

First, I want to say that I have the Little Devil Teemo Icon from the Teemoing 2016. However, like the OP I just received a summoner icon from Hextech Crafting called "Little Devil Teemo" . However, the icon isn't Little Devil Teemo (since I have it) and is actually the Star Guardian Pix icon. Do you guys receycle/reuse the same source code for different events but change certain elements? That would explain why the SG Pix icon said it was the Teemoing icon

-rekd1
